title.en: Ansatsu Skill de Isekai Saikyou ~Renkinjutsu to Ansatsujutsu o Kiwameta Ore wa, Sekai o Kage kara Shihai suru~

altTitles.ja: 暗殺スキルで異世界最強　～錬金術と暗殺術を極めた俺は、世界を陰から支配する～

altTitles.en: The Strongest in Another World with Assassination Skills: I, Who Has Mastered Alchemy and Assassination, Dominate the World from Behind

altTitles.ko: 암살 스킬로 이세계 최강~연금술과 암살술을 다한 나는, 세계를 그늘에서 지배한다~

description.en:
Late has just accepted an assassination request from a mysterious client. To his surprise, it was actually the goddess Mises, a goddess from another world whose existence was on the brink of destruction after her defeat in war. Mises' quest… is to assassinate Masra Dzur, another god in her world.

Can Late, the killer with a 99.9% success rate, fulfill this otherworldly assassination?
description.ja: 任務達成率99.9％の暗殺者レイトはある日突然、得体のしれない依頼人から暗殺の依頼を受ける。驚くことにその依頼人の正体は戦いに敗れ、存在を滅ぼされつつあった異世界の女神「ミーゼス」であった。ミーゼスからの依頼の内容、それは「異世界の神、マスラ・ズール」の暗殺。最強の暗殺者レイトの次の暗殺対象は「異世界の神」!?　原作進行諸島が送る、異世界転生×最強暗殺者×神殺し、第一巻開幕――…!!

altTitles.ja: てんぷる

description.en: That's right, I'll become a monk! Not knowing what to do with his worldly desires, Akagami Akemitsu aims to live a stoic life. However, the thick karmic blood flowing in him will not permit it!
description.es: Así es, me volveré un monje! Al no saber qué hacer con sus deseos mundanos, Akagami Akemitsu aspira a llevar una vida estoica. Sin embargo, la espesa corriente de energía del karma que fluye en él no lo permitirá.
description.es-la: "É isso mesmo, eu vou me tornar um monge!". Sem saber o que fazer com seus desejos mundanos, Akagami Akemitsu decide viver uma vida estóica. No entanto, o sangue cármico espesso que flui nele não permitirá!

altTitles.ja: 彼女のそれにやられてる

altTitles.en: I'm Being Done In By Those Things Of Hers

description.en: A gloomy boy suddenly getting close with the popular track and field club ace?! A short comedy about invading someone else's spot to skip class is about to begin!!
description.pt-br: Um rapaz sombrio de repente se aproximando do popular ás do clube de atletismo?! Uma comédia curta sobre invadir o espaço de outra pessoa para escapar das aulas está prestes a começar!!

title.en: A Rank Party wo Ridatsu Shita Ore wa, Moto Oshiego Tachi to Meikyuu Shinbu wo Mezasu.

altTitles.en: I Left my A-Rank Party to Help My Former Students Reach the Dungeon Depths!

altTitles.ja: Aランクパーティを離脱した俺は、元教え子たちと迷宮深部を目指す。

altTitles.zh-hk: 脫離了A級隊伍的我，和從前的徒弟們前往迷宮深處。

description.en:
"I can't do this!"

Yoke Feldio, A Red Mage, has left his A-rank party of five years to become an adventurer, and has finally run out of patience with his life as an adventurer. being ridiculed as a "Handyman" and "poor dexterity"!

And so begins a desperate life of joblessness....

HOWEVER! Soon after Yoke is welcomed into a party of former students, all of whom are girls! And as he conquers dungeons, Yoke's abilities are revealed one after another.

In fact, the magic and skills that he wields have a power that is beyond the norm--?

altTitles.ja: パーフェクトアディクション

description.en:
“I like your face. Your beauty is perfect!” –

Akihito, a flowery student who only likes people with beautiful faces, thought so when he met Sae - a person with both a delicate face and a calm demeanor that made him forget the way home. During the meeting party, when Akihito realized that Sae was also with the girl he was "paying attention to", he was extremely bitter. Suddenly he accidentally witnessed an argument between Sae and a man in the hotel. Actually, Sae is a tree; When he confided the troubles and frustrations in his heart, he seemed to turn into a completely different person than usual.

Akihito got excited and used pressure on Sae to get on the bed. Sae was surprised but the situation was out of control ~

description.de:
Als die sechsjährige Inés zum ersten Mal den gut aussehenden Erben von Haus Escalante erblickt, macht sie den Jungen direkt zu ihrem Verlobten. Da alle adeligen Männer bekanntlich gleich sind, dachte sie, sie könnte auch gleich einen gut aussehenden wählen. Aber der kleine Lord Cárcel ist noch nicht bereit für diese Art von Verpflichtung und verbringt die nächsten 15 Jahre damit, die Heirat um jeden Preis zu vermeiden. Glücklicherweise ist das kein Problem für Inés, da das Scheitern ihrer Ehe genau das ist, was sie will. Tatsächlich gibt sie ihm sogar ihren Segen dafür, sich auszutoben, solange er sich nicht in ihre Angelegenheiten einmischt. Leider macht es nicht so viel Spaß, ein Playboy zu sein, wenn die Verlobte einem die Erlaubnis dazu gibt. Und bedeutet das nicht, dass sie ihn auch betrügt? Und so entschließt sich Cárcel, Inés’ Meinung über ihn zu ändern und zu beweisen, dass er der Ehemann sein kann, den sie immer wollte.

---

description.en:
When six-year-old Inés laid eyes on the handsome heir to House Escalante, she promptly made the boy her fiancé. Since noblemen are all the same, she figured she might as well choose a pretty one. But Lord Cárcel isn't ready for this sort of commitment just yet, and he spends the next decade and a half avoiding the marriage at all costs! Luckily, that's no trouble for Inés, as this marriage failing is exactly what she wants. In fact, he has her blessing to sow his wild oats as long as he stays out of her business. Unfortunately, being a playboy isn't as fun when your fiancée gives you permission. And doesn't this mean she's cheating on him too? Now, Cárcel is determined to change Inés' mind about him and prove he can be the husband she's always wanted.

---

description.fr:
Lorsque la jeune Inés pose ses yeux sur l'héritier de la famille Escalante du haut de ses six ans, elle n'hésite pas un instant avant de demander à ce qu'il soit son fiancé. Comme les hommes nobles sont tous les mêmes, autant en choisir un beau, pas vrai? Mais le seigneur Cárcel n'est pas du genre fidèle, et il aimerait bien esquiver ce mariage... seulement, lorsque quelques années plus tard, il apprend qu'Inés se fiche bien de son amour et de sa fidélité après leur union, et qu'elle n'est pas éprise de lui comme il le pensait, Cárcel réalise qu'il n'était pas si désintéressé qu'il ne l'aurait cru. Il décide donc de prouver à sa future femme qu'il peut être un époux digne d'elle... sans se douter une seconde de ce qui avait bien pu pousser Inés à le choisir ainsi lorsqu'ils étaient enfants...

---

description.id:
Dia bilang setelah kami menikah nanti, aku bahkan bisa lebih bebas daripada saat ini? Omong kosong macam apa itu? Dia bahkan memperbolehkanku untuk berkencan dengan wanita mana pun? Dia adalah seorang Duchess Escallante yang tidak tinggal bersama dengan Duke Escallante. Dia tidak butuh pria yang baik hati, melainkan pria yang suatu saat bisa disingkirkan dari kehidupannya secara hukum. Tapi sayang sekali, aku, Duke Escallante, tidak akan membiarkan hal itu terjadi. Aku tidak tertarik dengan kebebasan yang kau tawarkan. "Aku memang seorang bajing*n, tapi aku lebih setia daripada yang kamu bayangkan, Ines Valeztena."

description.it:
Inés non aveva bisogno di un marito normale, ma di un uomo che un giorno sarebbe stato legalmente rimosso dalla sua vita . Sfortunatamente , avere un playboy come fidanzato non è per niente una cosa bella. È così che Cárcel é stato etichettato. Ma ad un certo punto decide di cambiare e dimostrare che può essere il marito perfetto!

description.uk:
Шестирічна Інес звертає увагу на красеня-спадкоємця дому Ескаланте та оголошує його своїм нареченим. Оскільки усі знатні чоловіки для неї однакові, вона подумала, що могла хоча би вибрати гарненького. Але лорд Карсель ще не готовий до такого роду зобов’язань. Він проводить наступні півтора десятиліття, уникаючи шлюбу за будь-яку ціну!
На щастя, для Інес це не проблема, оскільки фіаско цього заміжжя — це саме те, чого вона хоче. Таким чином Карсель отримує благословення на походеньки, допоки він не втручається у її бізнес.
Та, на жаль, бути плейбоєм не так весело, коли ваша наречена дає вам дозвіл. І чи не означає це, що вона теж йому зраджує? Тепер Карсель налаштований змінити думку Інес про нього і довести, що він може бути чоловіком, якого вона завжди хотіла.

---

description.pt-br:
“Me casei com o maior gostosão da sociedade para então me divorciar e finalmente poder ser livre.”

Quando Inês de 6 anos colocou seus olhos no lindo herdeiro da Casa Escalante, ela logo o fez seu noivo. Já que homens nobres são todos iguais, ela imaginou que poderia pelo menos escolher um bonito. Mas lorde Cassel ainda não estava pronto para esse tipo de compromisso, e passou uma década e meia evitando o casamento de todo jeito! Felizmente, isso não era problema para a Inês, porque a falha neste casamento era exatamente o que ela queria. Na verdade, ele tinha a permissão dela para fazer o que quisesse, contanto que ficasse fora dos assuntos pessoais dela. Infelizmente, ser um playboy não é divertido quando se tem a permissão da esposa. E isso não significa que ela o está traindo também? Agora, Cassel está determinado a mudar a ideia que Inês tem na cabeça sobre ele e provar que ele pode ser o marido que ela sempre quis.

description.en: "Tales of Greed" is back with an even deeper story! What if the desires that every human can have become a reality? Will the outcome ultimately lead to happiness or bring about destruction?
description.id: 'Diary of Desire' kini kembali dengan cerita yang lebih deep! Bagaimana jika keinginan yang bisa dimiliki oleh setiap manusia menjadi kenyataan? Apakah akhirnya akan bahagia atau malah membawa kehancuran?
description.ko:
더욱 더 매운맛으로 돌아온 욕망일기의 새로운 에피소드
인간이라면 누구나 가질법한 욕망,
그것이 현실로 이루어진다면?
그 끝은 과연 행복일까 파멸일까..

altTitles.ja: カテキン

description.en: 2nd grade junior high school kid Shirai Sachi (14-years old) gets tutored by the beautiful and easy-going woman Chabatake Nana (21-years old). Although she slacks off when tutoring, actually not helping his studies at all, for Sachi it's all fine and dandy. Being alone together with a hot, older woman in his own bedroom, frolicking around, unintentionally revealing neathage, or just lying down on his bed, with her bare long legs or the cleavage of her ample breasts in perfect view. Who could complain? It's an adolescent boy's fantasy fulfilled!

title.ja: Blue Skin, Big Tits and a Fucking Loner

altTitles.ja: 青肌巨乳とクソボッチ

altTitles.ja-ro: Ao Hada Kyonyuu to Kuso Botchi

altTitles.en: Blue Skin, Big Tits and a Fucking Loner

description.en:
Somewhere, in the heavens, a high school for angels.

Liane, an apprentice angel in that school, doesn't have any friends and is shunned by everyone, but keeps on doing her best to become an archangel.

To be blunt, she's a loner.

She has a natural enemy: Ruri, the school's idol, a gyaru-like demoness who, even though she can't study, is beloved by everyone. How annoying!

One day, Liane unexpectedly starts teaching Ruri how to study! Liane is puzzled because she has always hated her, but then Ruri insists and tells her, "Let's start off as friends...".

This is how the friendship between a blue gyaru and a loner begins, something they have never experienced before and their exciting days of youth are about to begin!

altTitles.ja: ぼっち・ざ・ろっく！

description.en:
Hitori Gotou is a high school girl who's starting to learn to play the guitar because she dreams of being in a band, 
but she's so shy that she hasn't made a single friend. 
However her dream might come true after she meets Nijika Ijichi, a drummer girl looking for a new guitarist for her band.
description.es: Bocchi The Rock! cuenta la historia de Goto Hitori, una chica de secundaria que empieza a aprender a tocar la guitarra persiguiendo su sueño de formar parte de una banda. Pese a que es muy dedicada, su arrolladora timidez le impide poder conseguir siquiera una amiga. Pero cuando conozca a Ijichi Nijika, una baterista que está buscando una nueva guitarrista para su grupo, Goto dará el primer paso para cumplir su gran sueño página a página, tira a tira.
description.it:
Hitori Goto è una liceale che inizia a imparare a suonare la chitarra perchè il suo sogno è di entrare a far parte di una band, 
ma è talmente timida da non avere nemmeno un amico. 
Ma il suo sogno potrebbe avverarsi in seguito all'incontro con Nijika Ijichi, una ragazza che suona la batteria 
ed è alla ricerca proprio di un chitarrista per la band in cui suona.
description.ja:
「ぼっちちゃん」こと後藤ひとりは、ギターを愛する孤独な少女。
家で一人寂しく弾くだけの毎日でしたが、ひょんなことから伊地知虹夏が率いる「結束バンド」に加入することに。
人前での演奏に不慣れな後藤は、立派なバンドマンになれるのか――！？
全国のぼっちな少年少女に届ける、いま最高にアツい音楽漫画！！
陰キャならロックをやれ！！！
description.pt-br:
Hitori Gotou é uma colegial que está começando a aprender a tocar violão porque sonha em fazer parte de uma banda, mas é tão tímida que não fez um único amigo. No entanto, seu sonho pode se tornar realidade depois que ela conhece Nijika Ijichi, uma garota que toca bateria e está procurando um novo guitarrista para sua banda.

[ 1° TEMP.  DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 2, Cap 21. ]

altTitles.ja: 銀牙伝説WEED
銀牙伝説ウィード

description.en:
A dog named Weed happens to hear he is the son of Gin, the great leader of Ohu, who lead the dogs of Ohu to victory in a fight against the monstrous bear Akakabuto.   
Weed wants to find his father no matter what.   
On his way to find him, Weed hears that his father has been captured by a ruthless villain called Hougen.  
  
Sequel to Ginga Nagareboshi Gin.

altTitles.ja: くま クマ 熊 ベアー

description.en: Yuna, a 15-year-old girl, started playing the world's first VRMMO. She has earned billions of yen in stocks and confines herself in her house playing the game without going to school. Today, a major update has arrived and she obtained a non-transferable rare bear outfit. But the equipment is so embarrassing that she can't wear it even in the game. Furthermore, when she answers the survey regarding the new update and relaunches the game, she appears in an unknown forest in the bear outfit. Where is this? Email from God? A different world? If she wears the bear outfit she's a cheat, if she takes it off she's a normal girl. Her adventure starts just like that. Yuna began doing whatever she wanted.
description.ru:
Пятнадцатилетняя девочка Юна уже три года ведет жизнь хиккикомори. Друзей, школу и даже родителей ей заменяют Интернет и онлайн-игры. Год назад она начала играть в игру «Fantasy World Online» — RPG с виртуальной реальностью. Она заработала миллиарды и с помощью денег избавилась от присутствия родителей.  
  
И вот, вышло новое глобальное обновление. Как игрок с большим стажем, она по акции получила уникальный костюм. Затем прошла опрос и вместо игры оказалась в глухом лесу. Письмо от Бога? Другой мир? Что за бред?  
  
В своем новом костюме она читер. Без него обычная девочка. Так началось ее приключение, в котором она решила делать то, что ей захочется.

altTitles.en: Katagiri-san, Blocking the View at the Last Moment

altTitles.ja: ギリギリ遮る片桐さん

altTitles.zh: 勉強遮得住的片桐同學

description.en: Okada-kun is a guy who's at the bottom of the school caste. His only reason for living is to someday see his classmate's large boobs. However, whenever he so much as makes an attempt, Katagiri, his flat-chested classmate, is delighted to block his view, relishing in his look of despair. Just where will their battle without honor take them?!

altTitles.ja: 呪術廻戦

description.en:
For some strange reason, Yuji Itadori, despite his insane athleticism would rather just hang out with the Occult Club. However, her soon finds out that the occult is as real as it gets when his fellow club members are attacked!

Meanwhile, the mysterious Megumi Fushiguro is tracking down a special-grade cursed object, and his search leads him to Itadori...
description.fr:
Yuuji est un jeune étudiant qui excelle dans le sport, notamment dans l'athlétisme, mais qui a un immense poil dans la main. Du coup, au lieu de parfaire ses capacités physiques qui pourraient lui permettre de devenir le meilleur de l'établissement, il s'est inscrit au club de recherches occultes du lycée. Son petit train-train va changer du tout au tout lorsqu'un véritable esprit malfaiteur vient menacer son école…

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Ki-oon**
description.ru: Юдзи гений на поле! Вот только школьная активность его мало чем привлекает. Став частью клуба оккультных исследований он решает зажить тихой жизнью, но все меняется, когда в школе объявляются духи.
description.tr: Yuuji bir atletizm dehasıdır ama koşuya hiç ilgisi yoktur. Bilinmezleri Araştırma Kulübünde çok mutludur. Her ne kadar kulüpte eğlencesine bulunsa bile, okulda gerçek bir ruh ortaya çıkınca işler ciddiye biner! Hayat, Sugisawa Şehrindeki 3 Numaralı Lisedeki çocuklar için tuhaflaşmaya başlamak üzere!
description.uk: Ітадорі Юуджі - надзвичайно талановитий старшокласник із Сендаю. Утім, хоч він і вправний спортсмен, його не цікавлять спортивні клуби: він піклується про свого дідуся, що лежить у місцевій лікарні. Все змінюється, коли через жартівливий спіритичний сеанс на Юуджі та його друзів раптово нападають моторошні чудовиська, яких дивакуватий незнайомець, Фушіґуро Меґумі, чомусь називає прокляттями. Аби врятувати себе та друзів, Юуджі змушений ризикнути - і так випадково стати вмістилищем легендарного, наймогутнішого короля проклять. А потім на тобі - вирок: "тебе мають стратити". Ну і що робити? Тяжкий вибір, магічна школа, нові друзі й нові проблеми - так починається його шлях...
description.pt-br: Itadori Yuuji, um estudante do colegial com uma capacidade física única, tem como rotina visitar seu avô que está hospitalizado. Porém, um dia, o selo de um "objeto amaldiçoado" escondido em sua escola é rompido, fazendo surgir criaturas assustadoras. Para salvar seus colegas ele parte em direção ao colégio, quando algo inesperado acontece...!

altTitles.ja: 恋愛代行

description.en: A half-Swedish, half-Japanese girl who seems to have everything except experience with men is using a date coaching app to get used to flirting. However the guy she hits it off with actually uses the same app with a different coach!
description.id:
Renai Daikou (Love Agency) – Agen Cinta
Akasaka Aka x Nishizawa 5mm
Akasaka Aka, yang telah membuat sejarah dalam sejarah komedi romantis dengan “Kaguya-sama wa Kokurasetai: Tensai-tachi no Renai Zunousen”, kembali dengan komedi romantis baru! Tim baru ini bekerja sama dengan Nishizawa 5mm, seorang pendatang baru yang sedang menjadi topik hangat di dunia manga online! Ini adalah awal dari “komedi
description.ru:
Девушка со шведскими и японскими корнями, у которой, кажется, есть всё, кроме опыта общения противоположным полом, использует приложение для обучения свиданиям, чтобы научиться флиртовать.
Однако парень, с которым у нее завязываются отношения, использует то же приложение с другим тренером!
description.uk:
Ака Акасака, автор "Каґуя-сама хоче, щоб він зізнався їй. Війна сердець та розумів геніїв" та "Дитя улюбленця", презентує свій новий витвір!

У Марі Марії Вінтер-Нанасе, наполовину шведки, наполовину японки, є все, про що можна мріяти. Дівчина виросла в заможній родині закордоном, має багато подруг і вродливу зовнішність. Однак є в ній один недолік: вона не вміє розмовляти з хлопцями!

Узявши в бібліотеці книгу про кохання, у ній вона знайшла підозрілу рекламу. Там йшлося про Агентство Кохання, що надає профі в коханні, який упорається з вашим особистим життям за вас. Після того, як дівчина відсканувала код, з'являється агентка, на ім'я Кон, та обіцяє допомогти Марі зійтися з її коханим. Однак хлопець, що припав їй до душі, Секі Масая, не такий уже й невинний і також користується послугами агентства, щоб почати зустрічатися з нею. Як складеться доля цієї пари?
description.vi: Tác phẩm của Akasaka Aka (tác giả của Oshi no Ko và Kaguya-sama) và Nishizawa 5mm. Một cô gái mang trong mình dòng máu Thụy Điển và Nhật Bản cực kỳ ưu tú nhưng cô ấy lại không có kinh nghiệm với đàn ông. Cô ấy quyết định sử dụng một ứng dụng dịch vụ tình yêu để chinh phục chàng trai ấy. Tuy nhiên, anh chàng mà cô ấy nhắm đến cũng đang sử dụng ứng dụng đó để chinh phục cô!
description.pt-br: Uma garota meio sueca/meio japonesa que parece ter tudo, exceto experiência com homens, está usando um aplicativo de coaching para encontros para se acostumar a flertar. No entanto, o cara com quem ela se dá bem na verdade usa o mesmo aplicativo com um treinador diferente!

description.en:
Wakana Gojou is a fifteen year old high-school boy who was socially traumatized in the past due to his passions. That incident left a mark on him that made him into a social recluse. Until one day he had an encounter with Kitagawa who is a sociable gyaru, who is the complete opposite of him. They soon share their passions with one another which leads to their odd relationship.

---
**Links:**
- Promotional video - [YouTube](https://youtu.be/FdEk9V9g424)
description.fr:
Wakana Gojo est un lycéen solitaire. Son rêve est de devenir artisan et de fabriquer les poupées traditionnelles pour le Hina Matsuri. Mais comme cette passion n’est pas très virile, il la cache et ne se fait pas remarquer. Jusqu’au jour ou Marine Kitagawa, la fille la plus populaire du lycée, le voit se servir d’une machine à coudre ! Contre toute attente elle lui demande de devenir son couturier pour réaliser… des tenues de cosplay !

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kana**
description.tr: Wakana Gojou, vadesi geçmiş tutkuları nedeniyle toplumsal travmaları olan 15 yaşında bir liselidir. Bu olayın bıraktığı iz onu toplumdan uzak biri haline getirdi. Bir gün kendisinin tam zıttı, arkadaş canlısı bir gal olan Kitagawa ile karşılaşır. Kısa zamanda garip ilişkilerini yönlendiren tutkularını paylaşırlar.
description.uk:
Вакана Ґоджьо — п’ятнадцятилітній учень старшої школи, в минулому отримав серйозну психологічну травму на фоні свого захоплення. Внаслідок чого хлопець ізолював себе від соціуму і почав вести затворницький образ життя.
Так було би і на далі, але в життя Ґоджьо буквально увірвалась Кітаґава — дружелюбна і комунікабельна дівчина, повна його протилежність. Досить швидко вони розділили хоббі один одного, що і привело до їх досить дивних, але міцних відносин.
description.vi: Wakana Gojou 15 tuổi là 1 học sinh cao trung từng bị tổn thương tâm lý trong quá khứ do sở thích kỳ lạ của mình. Chuyện đó đã khiến cậu trở nên nhút nhát, rụt rè. Cho tới ngày nọ Gojou tình cờ gặp Kitagawa – một Gyaru – người có tính cách trái ngược hoàn toàn với cậu ấy. 2 người họ hóa ra đều có những điểm chung và đã tạo thành một mối quan hệ hài hước
description.es-la: Wakana Gojou es un joven de quince años de edad que se vio traumatizado socialmente en el pasado debido a sus pasiones. Ese incidente le dejó una marca que lo convirtió en un recluso social. Hasta que un día tuvo un encuentro con Kitagawa, una gyaru sociable, que es todo lo contrario a él. Pronto comparten sus pasiones entre sí, lo que da lugar a su extraña relación.
description.pt-br: Wakana Gojou é um garoto de quinze anos que foi socialmente traumatizado no passado devido a suas paixões. Aquele incidente deixou uma marca nele que o fez ser um recluso social. Até que um dia ele teve um encontro com Kitagawa, que é um gyaru sociável, que é o completo oposto dele. Eles logo compartilham suas paixões uns com os outros, o que leva a um relacionamento estranho.

A slapstick comedy that involves a town and it's neighbors where "pet dogs" have become "humans"!
Feelings that couldn't be conveyed as a dog can now be understood directly...!?
description.fr: Un jour, les chiens de cette ville sont soudainement devenus humains. L'histoire suit la vie de Saki et de son chien Ponta.
description.ru: В один прекрасный день домашние собаки в этом городе вдруг превращаются в людей. История рассказывает о жизни хозяйки Саки и ее собаки Понты.
description.uk: Одного разу всі собаки, які жили в цьому місті раптово перетворилися на людей. Історія розповідає про життя Сакі, власниці, та Понти, її пса.

altTitles.ru: 25 лет развивая бесполезный навык, я стал сильнейшим искателем приключений

altTitles.en: Adventurer Tale of Pouring 25 Years of Life Into a Useless Skill, and Now After All That Time Is the Strongest
The Man Devoted 25 Years to the Weakest Skill, "Restore," Finally He Got the Strongest One

altTitles.ja: 役立たずスキルに人生を注ぎ込み25年
役立たずスキルに人生を注ぎ込み25年、今さら最強の冒険譚

altTitles.ko: 무쓸모 스킬에 인생을 쏟은지 25년, 이제 와서 최강의 모험담
쓸모없는 스킬에 인생을 쏟아부은 지 25년, 때늦은 최강의 모험담

altTitles.ja-ro: Yakudatazu Skill ni Jinsei o Sosogikomi 25-nen, Imasara Saikyō no Bōkentan

description.en:
A skill useless from the beginning, <Restoration>. Regardless, in order to save a childhood friend who sacrificed her body to protect him, Touru spent twenty-five years developing the skill. Once completed, the skill could completely defy the world’s common sense. Touru, the girl, the naughty child they picked up in a back alley, and the old landlord lady join together as companions, setting out on an adventure to become heroes. A man who lived through the depths of despair decided to move forward and widen his horizons.

---

Alternative description (ComicWalker):  
Touru's childhood friend Sora was attacked by a monster, and was suspended in a state of near death. The only way to save her was to raise his skill <Restoration>. However, even at low levels, it's a struggle against mere goblin opponents. Now, 25 years have passed. But after all his efforts and hard work, Touru's hand now holds a versatile skill that can "Freely Restore the Subject to it's Past State"! Originally forged from his masterful instincts and past experiences, he furthermore got the strongest skill. And now finally he makes his name known in the world!
description.ja:
Alternative Raw: [NicoNico Seiga](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/42124)  
Japanese Light Novel: [Bookwalker](https://bookwalker.jp/series/191792/)  
Japanese Web Novel: [Syosetu](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n1850ew/)
description.ru: Этот навык был бесполезен с самого начала. Но несмотря на это, ради спасения подруги детства, которая пожертвовала своим телом, чтобы защитить его, Тору потратил 25 лет, развивая этот навык. А когда он закончил, навык мог полностью игнорировать здравый смысл мира. Тору, девушка, непослушный ребёнок, которого они подобрали на задворках, и старая леди-домовладелица объединяются в команду, отправившись в приключение, чтобы стать героями. Человек, который прошёл через глубины отчаяния, решил идти вперёд, чтобы расширить свой кругозор.

altTitles.ja: ロックマンさん

description.ar: بعد انتهاء القتال مع وايلي روكمان يخوض معركة جديدة كطبيب اسنان في العالم الحقيقي
description.en: Much time has passed since his battle with Dr. Wily, and Rockman has grown up in a peaceful world. Working as a dentist at the dental clinic opened by Dr. Right, Rockman struggles in his daily life with the allies he once fought with!

altTitles.ja: 茜部先生は照れ知らず

description.en:
Kouki Sakieda is an assistant for Akira Akanabe, a manga artist he admires, who always tries to praise him in some way. Sakieda is worried that he will end up falling in love with her if this situation continues. Then Akanabe unexpectedly asks him to go out with her... 

The story depicts the daily life of Akanabe-sensei, who lavishes praise on Sakieda without embarrassment, and Sakieda, who tries to accept it all gracefully.
description.pt-br:
Kouki Sakieda é assistente de Akira Akanabe, uma mangaká que ele admira. Ela sempre tenta elogiá-lo de alguma forma. Sakieda está preocupado que possa acabar se apaixonando por ela se essa situação continuar. Então, inesperadamente, Akanabe o convida para sair...
A história retrata o dia a dia da Sensei Akanabe, que distribui elogios a Sakieda sem qualquer constrangimento, e de Sakieda, que tenta aceitar tudo com elegância.

title.en: Doukutsu Ou kara Hajimeru Rakuen Life ~Bannou no Saikutsu Skill de Saikyou ni!?~

altTitles.ja: 洞窟王からはじめる楽園ライフ ～万能の採掘スキルで最強に!?～

altTitles.en: A Cave King’s Road to Paradise: Climbing to the Top with My Almighty Mining Skills!

altTitles.ru: Пещерный король будет жить как в раю

altTitles.th: ชีวิตประจำวันของจอมราชันย์เริ่มต้นด้วยการขุดเหมือง

description.en: Hiel was ridiculed for having a useless crest and was exiled to a remote island. When he grabbed an pickaxe to reclaim the island, the true effect of his crest was revealed. With his production cheat he will reclaim this uninhabited island and start his life in paradise.
description.ja: 使えない＜紋章＞持ちと嘲笑され、荒れ果てた離島に追放されたヒール。 なんとか島を開拓しようとピッケルを握ったそのとき、紋章の真なる効果が発揮されて―ー!?

description.en:
A boy was locked in a basement and trained his entire life. His deranged father, the one who confined him, declared, 


“The Apocalypse is coming.” 

Now, armed with the training and survival skills he had honed over years of practice, he must survive the impending apocalypse.

title.en: Re:Zero kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu - Daiyonshou - Seiiki to Gouyoku no Majou

altTitles.es: Re:Zero - Empezar de cero en un mundo diferente - Arco 4: El santuario y la bruja de la avaricia

altTitles.en: Re:ZERO -Starting Life in Another World-, Chapter 4: The Sanctuary and the Witch of Greed

altTitles.ja: Re:ゼロから始める異世界生活 第四章 聖域と強欲の魔女

altTitles.ru: Re:Zero. Жизнь с нуля в альтернативном мире. Часть четвёртая: Святилище и ведьма жадности

altTitles.pt-br: Re:Zero - Capítulo 4: O Santuário e a Bruxa da Ganância

description.en: Natsuki Subaru defeats the white whale and the archbishop of the "Sloth" deadly sin, and is reunited with Emilia. The two have reconciled after overcoming a painful breakup, but new turmoil awaits them...
description.es:
Decididos a liberar a Rem de un misterioso letargo, Subaru y Emilia emprenden un nuevo viaje hacia el Santuario en donde se enfrentarán a nuevos peligros que jamás imaginarían.

¡La esperada adaptación del arco 4 comienza aquí!
description.ru: После победы над белым китом и архиепископом греха лени Петельгейзе, Субару наконец воссоединяется с Эмилией. Однако они узнают шокирующие новости, что на Круш с Рем по пути в столицу снова напал культ ведьмы. Круш потеряла свою память, а все воспоминания о Рем у людей были стёрты. Вместе с жителями деревни Субару решает вернуться обратно, однако деревня оказалась пустой. Оставшиеся жители, которые под руководством Рам отправились в так называемое "Святилище", до сих пор не вернулись. Что же там произошло?..

altTitles.ja: ハニーブラッド

description.en: When the daughter of a shaman gets "strung up" with a centuries-old vampire, is it love or something more sinister that binds them? From Narae Lee, artist of the hit OEL manga ’Maximum Ride,’ comes the story of two misfits and their quirky, fantastical romp to find one another.

While performing a task assigned by the Academy of Sciences, the Blade Team broke into the enemy bunker. The protagonist Xia Yan accidentally discovered the ancient Donghuang Bell. By mistake, Xia Yan activated the power of the Donghuang Bell. Portal. The entire special team was sent to the unknown planet Shanhaixing, a world full of dangers and rampant monsters. Their survival challenge in this dangerous land is about to begin, and an adventure full of hope and courage is about to begin.

title.en: The Blond Yankee and The Punishment Game

altTitles.ja: 金髪ヤンキーと罰ゲーム

description.en:
As part of her punishment game, the transfer student, Shindou Eruko, must talk to the coolest delinquent in the school, which turns out to be Hoshi Natsuki, the blonde delinquent in the class next door. However, she soon found out that Hoshi-kun might not be as scary as he looks...

This manga is Konogi Yoshiru's fantasy take on  [Shingeki no Eroko-san](https://mangadex.org/title/bdfc7777-f1ee-4131-82cb-2fb5861d32e1/shingeki-no-eroko-san-hen-na-oneesan-wa-danshikousei-to-nakayoku-naritai), depicting a setting with Eruko being in the same age as Hoshi-kun. It was later adapted in the main title as Eruko's dream sequence.

title.en: Uza Kawaii Kouhai to Ichaicha suru dake no Anthology Comic

altTitles.ja: ウザ可愛い後輩とイチャイチャするだけのアンソロジーコミック

altTitles.en: Just Flirting With a Cute, Annoying Kouhai - Comic Anthology

description.en:
Morals Committee Members, Drama Club, Photography Club, and boobs of all sizes - a full lineup of all kinds of cute kouhais! They'll laugh, tease, and even seduce their believed senpais! And they won't hold back to ask, "Aren't I cute?"  


---

**Contents**  
**Cover**: [Take](https://mangadex.org/author/bf1dd32e-94c7-43a0-ad91-af05d7897d5b)  
  
- Chapter 1. One Side of You by **Katou Yuuichi**
- Chapter 2. Ruruko Tachibana is Troublesome by **Tadano Natsu**
- Chapter 3. Sahara Won't Lose Today Either! by **Kutsugaeru**
- Chapter 4. Nishigaki Taking Advantage of Love by **Yasuda Kousuke**
- Chapter 5. Andou-senpai, Morals in Disorder by **Kashima Ui**
- Chapter 6. Afterschool Personal Lesson by **Takahashi Osamu**
- Chapter 7 by **Okada Anmitsu**

altTitles.ja-ro: 虎子、あんまり壊しちゃだめだよ

description.en: A shy, bashful, and nervous girl tries to survive in a high school for delinquents. The "abnormal" comedy begins.

altTitles.ja: あした、裸足でこい。

description.en:
Having given up on both study and dreams, Meguri Sakamoto ended his lacklustre high school life. 
But, on the day of the graduation ceremony, the dissappearance of his ex-girlfriend and now famous musician Chika Nito, has been reported in the news?!
Starting with a time leap, this is a love story about redoing one's youth.

title.en: Tonari no Seki ni Natta Bishoujo ga Horesaseyou to Karakattekuru ga Itsunomanika Kaeriuchi ni Shiteita

altTitles.en: My Seatmate Tries to Make Me Fall in Love with Her by Teasing Me Repeatedly, but Somehow She Was the One Who Fell

altTitles.ja: 隣の席になった美少女が惚れさせようとからかってくるがいつの間にか返り討ちにしていた

altTitles.en: The Cute Girl Sitting Next to Me Is Trying to Make Me Fall in Love With Her as a Way to Ridicule Me, but the Tables Were Turned on Her Before She Knew It
Turning the Tables on the Seatmate Killer!

altTitles.id: Gadis cantik yang duduk di sebelahku mencoba membuatku jatuh cinta padanya, tapi sebelum aku menyadarinya, dia membalas dendam padaku

description.en: She is someone with the nickname “Seatmate Killer”, and also one of the prettiest girl in the school. Every male student that became her seatmate has confessed to her, and all of them got rejected brutally. The one who became her new seatmate, the seat being located the furthest away from the front and beside one of the windows, thus being a godly seat that will make every male student jealous, is Narito Yuki. He is someone that generally you won’t notice at all. The entire class thought that he will fall for her in a short time, but that may not be the case…..
description.es: Ella es alguien con el apodo de "Asesina del compañero de asiento", y también una de las chicas más bonitas de la escuela. Todos los estudiantes varones que se convirtieron en sus compañeros de asiento se le han confesado, y todos fueron rechazados brutalmente. El que se convirtió en su nuevo compañero de asiento, en el asiento ubicado más lejos del frente y al lado de una de las ventanas, siendo un asiento piadoso que pondrá celosos a todos los estudiantes varones, es Narito Yuuki. Es alguien que generalmente no notarás en absoluto. Toda la clase piensa que se enamorará de ella en poco tiempo, pero ese podría no ser el caso…
description.id: Dia adalah seseorang dengan julukan "Seatmate Killer", dan juga salah satu gadis tercantik di sekolah. Setiap siswa laki-laki yang duduk disebelahnya telah menyatakan perasaan mereka kepadanya, dan semuanya ditolak dengan sangat kejam. Orang yang duduk disebelahnya sekarang adalah seorang siswa yang duduk paling jauh dari depan dan di samping salah satu jendela, sehingga menjadi tempat duduk yang membuat setiap siswa laki-laki iri padanya yaitu Narito Yuuki. Dia adalah seorang laki-laki biasa yang tidak menarik sedikit pun. Seluruh kelas berpikir kalau dia akan jatuh cinta pada gadis "Seatmate KIller" itu dalam waktu yang singkat, tapi ikenyataannya…
description.ja: 成戸悠己がクラスの席替えで隣になったのは、“隣になった男子は残らず告白（＋玉砕）してしまう”と噂される「隣の席キラー」鷹月唯李。何かにつけてグイグイ来る唯李に陥落も時間の問題……かと思いきや、悠己の鈍感具合は尋常じゃない！　むしろ唯李の方が、悠己のことを気になりだして!?　「くっそ、すました顔してぇ～。見てろよ見てろよ～……！」ネット発返り討ちラブコメディが、大幅加筆で登場！

title.en: At That Time, the Battle Began

altTitles.ja: そのとき修羅場が動いた

description.en: A guy whose love interests are all kinds of messed up yanderes.

altTitles.ja: Kono Koi Chaban ni tsuki

description.en:
Chako Hananoki thought she'd found happiness in a handsome fiancé, but when she realized a marriage to him would mean a total erasure of herself, she broke it off and moved back into her childhood home in the country—only to find a strange man and young woman living there? She finds a way to coexist with them, but when her stalker fiancé follows her home, she declares to him (and accidentally to the whole village as well) that this new man in her life is her husband?! A dramatic fake-marriage, found-family story for the ages. 

(Source: Kodansha)

altTitles.en: The Young Witch Wants To Have Sex?!

altTitles.ja: おぼこい魔女はまじわりたい!

altTitles.zh-hk: 想和見習魔女深入交流！

altTitles.vi: Cô Phù Thủy Trẻ Muốn Được Sex!

description.en: Hiiragi visits Chikage Komori, a transfer student that has never come to school. His chastity is at stake when he comes across a beautiful girl that is wearing nothing but a jacket!?
description.ja: 古森チカゲ。転校生なのに一度も登校した姿を見たことがない彼女のご近所に住む柊木は学校のプリントを届けにいくが、出会った瞬間にいきなりカラダの関係を迫られて!?

description.en: Koo Hojin, who constantly falls for people to a fault, and Baek Yoosung, the authoritative and arrogant heir to a large company, spend the best and worst one-night stand together. A few days later, under one condition, Yoosung pays off Hojin's debt…

altTitles.ja-ro: Boku no Kokoro no Yabai Yatsu

altTitles.ja: 僕の心のヤバイやつ
僕ヤバ

description.de:
Der Teenager Ichikawa Kyoutarou gehört zu den allerletzten auf seiner Schule. Neben seinen Bemühungen, Unterhaltungen mit einer bestimmten Klassenkameradin aufrechtzuerhalten, muss er sich außerdem noch dafür zusammenreißen, mörderische Dränge aus den Tiefen seiner Seele zu verbergen.

Eigentlich ist es aber eine niedliche Liebesgeschichte zwischen einem geistig gestörten Jungen und einer fröhlichen, leicht komisch, jedoch schönen Mädchen.
description.en:
A ‘fearsome psycho-thriller’ centering on the ‘dark side of adolescence’.

Following Ichikawa Kyoutarou, a teenage boy belonging to the very bottom caste of his school, this work details his troubled interactions with a certain classmate, and his attempt to hide murderous impulses that find themselves in the darkest recesses of his soul.

In reality, though, it's a sweet youth rom-com between a messed up boy and a bright, if somewhat strange, beautiful girl.

- Won the Tsugi ni Kuru Web Manga 2020 Award.
- Was nominated for the 2020 and 2021 Manga Taisho Award.
- Won the top prize of 2021 Tsutaya Comic Awards
description.ja:
学園カースト頂点の美少女・山田杏奈の殺害を妄想してはほくそ笑む、重度の中二病の陰キャ・市川京太郎。だが山田を観察する内に、京太郎が思う「底辺を見下す陽キャ」とは全然違うことに徐々に気づいていき…!? 陰キャ男子

---

- Exclusive art is occasionally posted to [the series' official account](https://twitter.com/boku__yaba/status/1060017522303414273)
description.ru: «Страшный психо-триллер», сосредоточенный на «тёмной стороне юности». История повествует о Киотаро Ичикаве — человеке, находящемся на самой низшей ступени в своей школе и скрывающем убийственный порыв, находящийся в самой глубине его души... на деле же, это милый ром-ком про странного мальчика и прекрасную, хоть и слегка странную, девушку.
description.es-la:
La historia trata sobre un joven llamado Kyotaro Ichikawa que sufre de un caso grave de “chūnibyō” y se divierte imaginando la muerte de una hermosa chica llamada Anna Yamada, quien está en la cima de la jerarquía social de la escuela. Sin embargo, mientras observa a Yamada, Kyotaro comienza a darse cuenta de que ella es muy diferente de lo que él pensaba.

 - Ganó el premio Tsugi ni Kuru Web Manga 2020.
- Fue nominado para el premio Manga Taisho en 2020 y 2021.
- Ganó el primer premio en los premios Tsutaya Comic de 2021.
description.pt-br:
Um "intenso thriller psicológico" centralizado no lado obscuro da adolescência. 

O mangá gira em torno de Kyoutaro Ichikawa, uma pessoa no fundo da hierarquia de sua escola, que esconde um impulso assassino no fundo de sua alma. Mas na realidade, é uma doce comédia romântica entre um garoto confuso e uma garota brilhante, embora um tanto estranha e bonita.

title.en: Shingeki no Eroko-san ~Hen na Oneesan wa Danshikousei to Nakayoku Naritai~

altTitles.ja: 進撃のえろ子さん
進撃のえろ子さん～変なお姉さんは男子高生と仲良くなりたい～

altTitles.ru: Атака на Эроко ~Взрослая сестренка, которая хочет стать ближе со старшеклассником~

description.en:
Shindou Eruko, a glasses, big breasted beauty, found a job as a handyman for the Amaguri Handyman service after her NEET life comes to an end as her savings ran out. She immediately falls for her co-worker Hoshi-kun on their first day working together, but there's a problem: Hoshi-kun is a high school boy, while Eruko is a 27 years old onee-san who has trouble telling reality and delusions apart. She ends up constantly scheming to get close to Hoshi-kun to turn many of her delusions into reality, but after several near-misses, it became apparent to Eruko that Hoshi-kun does, indeed, have feelings toward her.
  
This manga takes place after Vol.14 in  [Henjo - Hen na Joshi Kousei Amaguri Senko](https://mangadex.org/title/15331/henjyo-the-strange-female-high-schooler-amaguri-senko)
description.pt: Shindou Eruko, uma grande beldade de seios grandes, encontrou um emprego de ajudante na empresa. Amaguri faz tudo, depois que a sua vida de NEET teve que acabar graças as suas economias. Ela imediatamente se apaixona por seu colega de trabalho, no qual se chama Hoshi, um garoto do ensino médi, enquanto a Eruko é uma mulher de 27 anos que tem problemas para diferenciar a ilusão de realidade. Ela acaba constantemente planejando se aproximar de Hoshi para transformar muitas de suas ilusões em realidade…
description.ru: Когда сбережения закончились, красотке в очках по имени Эруко пришлось прервать затворнический образ жизни и найти работу. Так она устроилась сотрудницей в сервис «Разнорабочие Амагури». В первый день работы Эруко влюбляется в коллегу Хоси, вот только есть проблема: Хоси — школьник, а Эруко — 27-летняя девушка, у которой проблемы с восприятием реальности. Эруко постоянно измышляет способы сблизиться с Хоси, чтобы воплотить свои фантазии в реальность.
description.pt-br: Shindou Eruko, uma grande beldade de seios grandes, encontrou um emprego de ajudante na empresa. Amaguri faz tudo, depois que a sua vida de NEET teve que acabar graças as suas economias. Ela imediatamente se apaixona por seu colega de trabalho, no qual se chama Hoshi, um garoto do ensino médi, enquanto a Eruko é uma mulher de 27 anos que tem problemas para diferenciar a ilusão de realidade. Ela acaba constantemente planejando se aproximar de Hoshi para transformar muitas de suas ilusões em realidade...

title.en: The Heavenly Demon Destroys the Lich King's Murim

altTitles.ru: Небесный Демон уничтожает Мурим короля Лича

description.en:
An unknown voice disturbed me while I was levitating during my cultivation to reach the transcendent demonic state.

My concentration had been broken, and I fell into an unconscious, overloaded state. When I awoke a month later, the Lich King had already taken control of the Murim.

After the battle that ended with the destruction of the Heavenly Demon Cult, I awoke a hundred and forty years later in a Murim where magic and martial arts coexisted.

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%B2%9C%EB%A7%88-%EB%A6%AC%EC%B9%98%EC%99%95%EC%9D%98-%EB%AC%B4%EB%A6%BC%EC%9D%84-%EB%B6%80%EC%88%98%EB%8B%A4/2583)
description.ko:
신마경의 경지에 도달하기 위해 발을 띄우던 중 알 수 없는 전음이 방해하기 시작했다.
결국 집중력이 흐트러져 주화입마에 빠져 쓰러지고,
한달 후 눈을 떠보니 이계에서 '리치왕'이란 자가 넘어와 무림을 뒤엎어 버린 후였다.
천마신교마저 뒤엎어버린 리치왕과의 대결을 마치고

140년이 지난 후 깨어난 무림은 무공과 마법이 공존하고 있었다.

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%B2%9C%EB%A7%88-%EB%A6%AC%EC%B9%98%EC%99%95%EC%9D%98-%EB%AC%B4%EB%A6%BC%EC%9D%84-%EB%B6%80%EC%88%98%EB%8B%A4/2583)
description.ru:
Голос неизвестного беспокоил меня, когда я практиковался во время своего совершенствования, чтобы достичь трансцендентного демонического состояния. 

Моя концентрация была нарушена, и я потерял сознание. Когда я проснулся месяц спустя, Король-лич уже взял под свой контроль весь Мурим. 

После битвы, которая закончилась разрушением Культа Небесного Демона, я проснулся сто сорок лет спустя в Муриме, где сосуществовали магия и боевые искусства (ред.)

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%B2%9C%EB%A7%88-%EB%A6%AC%EC%B9%98%EC%99%95%EC%9D%98-%EB%AC%B4%EB%A6%BC%EC%9D%84-%EB%B6%80%EC%88%98%EB%8B%A4/2583)

description.de: Die Highschool-Schülerin Aoi ist schwer verliebt in Makoto, ein superhübsches Mädchen, die die gleiche Schule besucht. Aber als Aoi ihren Mut zusammennimmt, Makoto ihre Liebe zu gestehen, nimmt die Geschichte plötzlich eine unerwartete Wendung: In Wirklichkeit ist Makato ein Junge, der sich als Mädchen verkleidet!
description.en:
The story of a crossdresser who receives a confession from a junior.

---

description.fr: Aoi, une élève de seconde, a eu le coup de coeur pour Makoto, une fille de 1ère super jolie. Mais quand Aoi prend son courage à deux mains pour se déclarer, Makoto lui fait une révélation inattendue... En réalité, c'est un garçon qui se déguise en fille !
description.ja: 男の娘が後輩に告白される話です。
description.ko:
하나오카 마코토는 귀여운 것을 아주 좋아하는 남자 아이.
어느 날, 마코토는 자신을 여자라고 착각하고 있는 여자 후배 사키에게 고백을 받는다.
거기에서 마코토는 자신이 남자인 것을 밝히지만 사키는 포기하지 않는다.
그 후에 마코토에 대해 특별한 감정을 품고 있는 류지와 3명 사이에서의 아련한 감정이 생겨난다.
description.th: ฮานาโอกะ มาโคโตะ เป็นนักเรียน ม.ปลาย ที่ไม่ว่าหนุ่มคนไหนเมื่อได้พบเห็นก็ไม่อาจละสายตาไปจากเธอได้ เพราะความน่ารักแสนสวยของเธอ แต่แท้จริงแล้วมาโคโตะนั้นเป็นผู้ชายที่แต่งตัวเป็นผู้หญิง! แถมแต่งได้สวยกว่าเด็กนักเรียนหญิงจริง ๆ เสียอีก เรื่องราวชุลมุนของความรักและความเข้าใจผิด ๆ ถูก ๆ ของวัยรุ่น ม.ปลาย จึงเริ่มต้นขึ้น!!
description.zh:
花季少女表白温柔女前辈，
谁曾想前辈竟然是男生！？
作为男生的花岗真琴从小喜欢一些可爱的东西，因为外表秀气，他经常把自己装扮为女生。某天，女主苍井咲突然向女装的真琴表白，真琴主动说出自己是男生。苍井咲本以为自己喜欢女生但当得知真琴是男生的这一刻，她下定决心更要主动出击追到真琴！
description.zh-hk: 蒼井咲對一見鍾情的學姊花岡真琴告白後，意外發現對方竟是男兒身。遭到真琴拒絕後，咲沒有放棄追求，反而越挫越勇，並與真琴的青梅竹馬龍二相識。一段特殊的情感在三個人之間蕩漾開來！

altTitles.ja: マリッジトキシン

description.en:
A hitman and a marriage swindler set out on the world’s most grueling battle for marriage!

Gero is a young man from a clan of hitmen, which has been in existence for hundreds of years. As someone who’s never gone to school and lived his life dealing in the dark side of the business, he considers himself to have “no prospects with women” and marriage as “something not for him.”

However, one day, in fear that their lineage would dissolve, his clan warns Gero that if he doesn’t marry and produce an heir, they would have no choice but to…force his little sister into doing “that.” Driven to his wits’ end, Gero asks the target of his work, a marriage swindler, to…
description.ja: <毎週水曜更新>殺し屋×結婚詐欺師の世界一ハードな婚活バトル物語！数百年続く殺し屋一族の青年・下呂。学校にも行かず裏稼業で生きてきた彼にとって女性は「苦手で縁遠いもの」であり、結婚は「するべきではないもの」と考えていた。だがある日、血が絶えることを恐れた彼の実家は、下呂が結婚し子供を残さないならば、妹に「それ」を強制することを通告。困り果てた下呂は仕事のターゲットであった結婚詐欺師に…。
description.pt-br:
Um assassino de aluguel e uma vigarista de casamentos partem na batalha mais cansativa do mundo! 

Gero é um jovem de um clã de assassinos, que existe há centenas de anos. Como alguém que nunca foi à escola e viveu sua vida lidando com o lado sombrio do negócio, ele se considera “sem perspectivas com mulheres” e o casamento é “algo que não é para ele”. No entanto, um dia, com medo de que sua linhagem se dissolva, seu clã avisa Gero que, se ele não se casar e ter um herdeiro, eles não terão escolha a não ser… forçar sua irmãzinha a fazer “isso”. Levado ao extremo, Gero pede ao alvo de seu trabalho, uma vigarista de casamento, para que...

altTitles.ja: リアリスト魔王による聖域なき異世界改革

altTitles.zh: 现实主义魔王的异世界改革

altTitles.ko: 리얼리스트 마왕에 의한 성역없는 이세계 개혁

altTitles.zh-hk: 現實主義魔王的異世界改革

altTitles.en: The Legendary Rebuilding of a World by a Realist Demon King

description.en:
In a dilapidated castle, Astaroth awoke as a Demon King. With his ‘wisdom from his past life,’ he would rule over his lands as a thorough ‘realist.’ “Demon King, why are you attacking the level 1 Heroes?” “Defeat them before they become stronger. That is called strategy.”  “Demon King, why are you sending fake money to the enemy country?” “To bring chaos to their economy, so they will self-destruct.” “The werewolf troops have attacked. Should we use silver bullets?” “Not bullets, shoot them with cannons.”  
  
And like that, Astaroth ‘reformed’ the old tendencies. He became a lord who was loved by the people and his subordinates, and he would go on to be called the most powerful Demon King in history.
description.ja: 72の魔王が跋扈する混沌とした世界に、72番目の魔王として転生したアシュタロト。そんな彼の前に突如謎の女神が現れ、この世界を改革するようアシュタロトを導く。初めに召喚したメイド兼参謀の魔族・イヴを従え、現実主義者（リアリスト）魔王の伝説がはじまる！
description.pt-br: Em um castelo em ruínas, Astaroth acordou como um Rei Demônio. Com sua "sabedoria de sua vida passada", ele governaria suas terras como um completo "realista".Conheça quem se tornou um senhor que era amado pelo povo e seus subordinados, o homem que seria chamado de o mais poderoso rei demônio da história.

title.en: Ice Lamp - The Chronicles of Kira

altTitles.en: An Ice Lamp - Chronicles of Gira

description.en:
A girl passing as a boy, fourteen-year-old Kira is left to fend for herself alone in this world. During a crucial turning point in her life, she makes a pact with a mystical entity in return for a male voice; this grants her to step into a bigger world by becoming a servant to a grand noble. From a commoner to a page boy, to a knight that leads others to battle, Kira matures through enduring agony and education. However, she's a mere pawn, an expendable being in the chess match between powerful men without any control over her own destiny. With no one to count on, can our heroine be able to change the fate others have chosen for her?

---
* Alternative Official English - [tappytoon](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/book/ice-lamp-the-chronicles-of-kira)

altTitles.ja: ダンジョンリセット

description.de:
Dawoons normales Leben wird auf den Kopf gestellt, als er in den Dungeon gerufen wird, wo er ein tödliches Spiel gegen gefährliche Monster und lebensbedrohliche Fallen spielen muss. Was die Sache schlimmer macht, ist, er ist nur ein einfacher Handwerker mit null Kampffähigkeiten. Aber nachdem Dawoon in eine Falle gerät und einen fehlerhaften Reset überlebt, hat er willkürliche und dennoch sehr hilfreiche Fähigkeiten. Zusammen mit einem blutrünstigen Gefährten und einem niedlichen Eichhörnchen muss er sich etwas einfallen lassen, um das Spiel zu gewinnen und nach Hause zurückzukehren. Welche Abenteuer erwarten ihn in den Tunneln – jetzt, wo die Regeln für ihn scheinbar nicht mehr gültig sind?

---
- [Official German Translation](https://www.tappytoon.com/de/comics/dungeon-reset-de)
description.en: Dawoon's ordinary life is turned upside down when he is summoned into the Dungeon, where he must play a deadly game, outlasting dangerous monsters and life-threatening traps. To make matters worse, he's only a mere crafter with zero combat abilities. But after Dawoon falls into a trap and survives after a glitched reset, he's gained random but oddly helpful skills. He'll need to get creative to clear the game and return home, with a bloodthirsty assistant and an adorable ground squirrel along for the ride. Now that the rules no longer apply to him, what possibilities await in the tunnels below.
description.fa: ⁧⁧   وقتی که بازنشانی شروع بشه، همه چیز به حالت قبلش برای شرکت کننده های بعدی برمیگرده، چرا بازنشانی روی من کار نمیکنه؟! با یک مهارت ساده بازی برای جئونگ داوون درون دانجن شروع میشه .
description.fr:
La vie ordinaire de Dawoon bascule le jour où il se retrouve invoqué dans un monde parallère, dans lequel il va devoir jouer à un jeu mortel intitulé Dungeon Game. Il se retrouve ainsi obligé à faire face à de dangereuses créatures, ainsi qu'à de nombreux pièges mettant constamment sa vie en péril. Et comme si cette situation ne suffisait pas, il s'avère également que l'abilité dont il a été doté est totalement inutile en combat. Néanmoins, après être tombé dans un piège et avoir mystérieusement survécu, un étrange bug va lui donner de nouvelles compétences aléatoires, mais étrangement utiles. Il va devoir redoubler d'astuce pour finir le jeu et pouvoir enfin rentrer chez lui, tout en ayant à ses côtés un Assistant de jeu assoiffé de sang, et un adorable petit écureuil. Maintenant qu'il n'a plus aucune règle à suivre avec assiduité, que va-t-il se passer pour lui dans cet étrange univers ?

---
- [Official French Translation](https://www.tappytoon.com/fr/comics/dungeon-reset-fr)
description.ja:
｢このダンジョンはリセットされます｣ 一度プレイしたダンジョンや罠は次の｢ユーザー｣のためにリセットされる。 しかしその｢リセット｣が俺には適応されない！？ 絶えずリセットされるダンジョンで唯一自由の身となった「奏多」。 その場しのぎで武装した｢バグ｣人間 定岡奏多のダンジョン開拓期が始まるーー！

---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/40532)
description.ko:
[던전이 리셋됩니다.]

한번 플레이한 던전이나 함정은 다음 '유저'들을 위해 '리셋'이라는 과정을 거친다.
그 '리셋'이, '나'에게는 적용되지 않는다?!


끊임없이 리셋되는 던전에서 유일하게 자유로워진 존재.
압도적인 노가다로 무장한 '버그 종자' 정다운의 던전 개척기가 시작된다!

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%8D%98%EC%A0%84-%EB%A6%AC%EC%85%8B/2373)
description.ru: [Идет перезагрузка Подземелья.] Подземелье или ловушки, в которых была игра, проходят стадию перезагрузки для следующих пользователей.Может, эта «перезагрузка» применима и ко мне?! Единственное существо, которое свободно от постоянно перезапускаемой Пещеры. Вооружившись грандиозной силой, Чон Да Ун начинает освоение Подземелья!
description.th:
[ดันเจี้ยนกำลังรีเซ็ต]  
เมื่อมีการเดินสำรวจดันเจี้ยนเกิดขึ้น, กับดักทุกอย่างเริ่มทำงาน, มันก็จะเริ่มทำการรีเซ็ตตัวเองเพื่อสำหรับ "ผู้เล่น" คนต่อไป  
แต่ทว่าการรีเซ็ตเหล่านั้นดันใช้ไม่ได้กับฉัน! ฉันจะต้องอยู่อย่างไร้จุดหมายในดันเจี้ยนแห่งนี้อย่างไร้กำหนด, ฉัน, จัง ดาอุน  
"เจ้าข้อผิดพลาด" ได้ได้เวลาเริ่มออกสำรวจดันเจี้ยนแห่งนี้แล้ว!
description.zh-hk:
［副本即將重置。］

為提供下一批「玩家」體驗，
已通過的副本、已觸發的陷阱
都會經過名為重置的過程。
然而，那所謂的「重置」居然對「我」不管用?!

在不斷重置的副本裡，身為唯一的自由之身，
只能把苦力活做好做滿，「農起來」武裝自己，
「Bug仔」鄭多運的副本開墾記就此展開!

---
- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E5%89%AF%E6%9C%AC%E9%87%8D%E7%BD%AE/140)

title.en: If You Are Reborn, the World of Chastity Will Be Reversed

altTitles.ja: 生まれ変わったら貞操逆転世界

description.en: The morning after a heavy snowfall, Yu Hirose was knocked down by an icy downhill car after staying up all night on his way home. When he wakes up, he is surprised to find that he has been reborn as a different person with the same last name and an extremely good-looking boy. Furthermore, I live in a situation where the ratio of men and women is unbalanced, with women taking the lead role in society, and the few men who are in a position where it is natural for them to be protected.There are women who have too much sexual desire and want men, and women who are afraid of women and are on the defensive. It was a world in which the composition of men entering the world had been created. Yuu's new school life begins in a world where chastity has been reversed.

altTitles.ja: ダブルコンプレックス

description.en:
Haruto, currently financially unstable, not in education, or in employment, is begging for rent money from a woman. When his negotiation plans go awry, the person who suddenly appears is none other than Haruto's brother, Asahi...!

He had always acted as the "perfect brother" in front of his family, so Haruto is unable to confide to anyone in his family about his current ruined state, and desperately tries to cover up the situation.

However, Asahi forces Haruto to bring him to his place, and he discovers Haruto's current state...?!

【An obsessed-type cool little brother x Former perfect older brother】
The love between brothers who frustratingly misunderstand each other unfolds! 

What is the truth behind the "complexes" that each of them harbors...?

title.en: Zombie no Afureta Sekai Ore Dake ga Osowarenai

altTitles.en: Only I Am Not Attacked in a World Overflowing With Zombies

altTitles.ja: ゾンビのあふれた世界で俺だけが襲われない

altTitles.en: In A World Filled With Zombies, I’m The Only One They Won’t Attack

altTitles.pt-br: Em um Mundo Cheio de Zumbis, Eu Sou o Único que Eles Não Vão Atacar

altTitles.id: Didunia yang penuh dengan Zombie hanya aku yang tidak diserang

altTitles.zh-hk: 在遍地都是喪屍的世界裡唯獨我不被襲擊

description.en: Takemura wakes up after falling ill for 3 days and realizes the world has been overrun by zombies but for some strange reason he is not being attacked by them! What will he do now with this great power he has?
description.id: Kehidupan sehari-hari pekerja kantor yang tidak disukai "Takemura" berubah dalam sekejap. Ketika aku perhatikan, itu adalah dunia yang penuh dengan zombie. Terlebih lagi, aku satu-satunya yang tidak diserang oleh zombie. "Bantu orang? Apa itu? Aku akan menjalani dunia ini sesukaku." Takemura memiliki banyak kekuatan di dunia apokaliptik di mana peradaban akan runtuh. Apakah dia satu-satunya pahlawan yang hidup dengan menyembunyikan fakta bahwa dia tidak diserang?
description.pt-br: Na sociedade atual, que foi completamente destruída por zumbis, há um homem que misteriosamente não é atacado por eles, e essa história segue sua estilo de vida egoísta. 18 Visualizações totais, 18 Visualizações hoje

altTitles.ja: ネトリヴェンジ

description.en: An introverted high school student, Souichi Sakuraba, is being bullied severely by the “Yokai” classmates. The bullying escalates, and Souichi’s childhood friend, Azusa, who was the only one who trusted him, is defiled by them. In front of Souichi, who was in the depths of despair, the succubus, Asmode, appeared. Souichi makes a contract with a succubus who possesses a mysterious ability, and decides to make the bully’s loved ones suffer the same pain as himself by “cuckolding” them. The obscene revenge by “NTR” begins.
description.es-la: Soichi Sakuraba, un introvertido estudiante de instituto, sufre el acoso de los abusadores de su clase. El acoso se intensifica y Azusa, la única amiga de la infancia en la que Soichi confía, es profanada por ellos. En medio de la desesperación, Soichi se enfrenta a Asmon, un demonio lascivo. Soichi hace un contrato con un demonio lascivo con poderes misteriosos, y decide infligir el mismo sufrimiento a sus verdugos "cornudando" a sus seres queridos. Comienza la lasciva venganza de "NTR"...
